## PositionObject interface

Full editor cursor position with line, column &amp; position

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PositionObject 
```

---

<br>

### Properties:

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [column](#column) | number | The 1 based column number of the cursor position |
|  [line](#line) | number | The 1 based line number of the cursor position |
|  [position](#position) | number | The 0 based absolute position number of the cursor position |

<br>

The 1 based column number of the cursor position

```typescript
column: number;
```

The 1 based line number of the cursor position

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
line: number;
```

### PositionObject.position property

The 0 based absolute position number of the cursor position

```typescript
position: number;
```
